name: Go Monster Go! (TiltFive)
description:
Are you ready to dash your way through an epic obstacle course filled with wacky monsters and exciting challenges? Go Monster Go! is a single-player clone of the popular multiplayer game Fall Guys, created for the Tilt Five AR system. Get those glasses on and that board out. You'll be jumping, diving, and dodging your way through a series of obstacles to reach the finish line.

With charming cartoon graphics and a lively soundtrack, Go Monster Go! is the perfect mix of fun and challenge. The physics-based gameplay will keep you on your toes, as you navigate tricky platforms, avoid obstacles, and compete against the clock. 

The immersive display of the Tilt Five glasses makes playing Go Monster Go! a delightful diorama experience. The game is perfect for all ages, with family-friendly content and easy-to-learn mechanics.

Features:
  • Single-player clone of Fall Guys, optimized for Tilt Five AR headset
  • Challenging obstacle courses with physics-based gameplay
  • Multiple levels of increasing difficulty
  • Colorful cartoon graphics and lively soundtrack
  • Intuitive controls for easy gameplay
System Requirements:
  • Tilt Five glasses and gameboard
  • Computer or laptop running the latest Tilt Five driver (1.2.1 or later)

Get ready for a monster-filled adventure like no other, with the fun and excitement of Fall Guys now available in a single-player AR game. Download Go Monster Go! today and race to the finish!

Page design made with much help and inspiration from alienmelon.itch.io. You rock!
